casebody.data:
Eliza L. Hinschberger, Respondent v. The Manhattan Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided March 14, 1892. Appeal by defendants from judgment in favor of plaintiff entered upon decision of a judge at special term. Davies & Rapallo, attorneys, and Joseph E. Lord of counsel, for appellants. Peck-ham & Tyler, attorneys, and Charles A. B. Pratt, Jr. of counsel, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Dugro and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
